_comment: _comment's are comments meant for helping understanding the text, they are not used in the code at all.
(Optional, defaults to the name of the folder)The name of the module to be displayed.
name: Example Module
_comment: (Optional, defaults to '0.0.1') The version of the module. All versions must be three numbers separated by a decimal.
(Optional, defaults to 'Unknown') The author of the module.
author: MinusGix
_comment: (Optional, default: '*.*.*') The version required to run this module. All versions are three numbers.
*.0.5, * means a wildcard, can be any number.
[version], >[version], and +[version] mean that the main Servers version should be [version] or greater.
=[version] means it 'softly' must be the same version. 0.5.5 would count the same as 0.5.4, 0.5.3, 0.5.2, 0.5.1., 0.5.0, essentially it ignores the third number.
==[version] means it must be the EXACT same version.
<[version] and -[version] mean that the server version must be [version] or lower
(Optional, default: 'index.js') Ran after everything is initialized, so it runs after app passport config usermodel usergroupmodel, will be passed an object of info
(Optional, default: {}) Overwrite base models, mixes them together with the module's overwrites taking precedence. Uses Object.assign to mix them.
(Optional, default: ''), Overwrites base config, mixing them together with the modules overwrites taking precedence. Uses Object.assign ot mix them.
